By Ruby Wish on Wednesday, April 2, 2008 - 03:07 pm:

i used a max stat code and took out the ARDS. my Mew was training and got -4000 power! What The?

By Thorr on Thursday, April 3, 2008 - 08:50 am:

You hit spillover.

Don't max out your stats and then train. Don;t do anything that will raise your stats after you hit max.

If you are max-ing out every stat, then you are going over the 6000 TOTAL stat limit. This is why you are having problems. Your stats must TOTAL 6000 only.
